description: It can get rough out there, so they made the Langley with extra protection. It's made from a performance woven fabric that is coated for water resistance. Filled with a lofty 133 gsm Primaloft® synthetic insulation to keep you warm, including inside the hand pockets. This insulated jacket was built for cold climates. They included a hidden interior phone pocket, an adjustable hood, and storm flaps for extra protection, because they got you. Great for travel and everything outdoors.
name: Vuori Langley Insulated Jacket - Mens
